languages.text: "Впрочем, после того, как вы спасли и его, и других арбитров с гибнущей планеты, ваши моральные качества не нуждаются ни в каких дополнительных похвалах".
"Though, having once saved him and the other Arbitrators from a dying planet, your character should require no further affirmation."
languages.original_text: "Впрочем, после того, как вы спасли и его, и других арбитров с гибнущей планеты, ваши моральные качества не нуждаются ни в каких дополнительных похвалах".

traits.locale_text: "Though, after you saved him and the other Arbitrators from a dying planet, your character should require no further affirmation."
"Though, after you saved him and the other Arbitrators from a dying planet, your character should require no further affirmation."
"Though, having once saved him and the other Arbitrators from a dying planet, your character should require no further affirmation."
"Though, having once saved him and the other Arbitrators from a dying planet, your character should require no further affirmation."
"Though, having once saved him and the other Arbitrators from a dying planet, your character should require no further affirmation."
"Though, having once saved him and the other Arbitrators from a dying planet, your character should require no further affirmation."

languages.text: « Même s'il est vrai qu'après les avoir sauvés, lui et les autres arbitrators, d'une planète en perdition, vos états de service se passent de commentaires. »
languages.original_text: "Though, having once saved him and the other Arbitrators from a dying planet, your character should require no further affirmation."

traits.locale_text: « Même s'il est vrai qu'après les avoir sauvés, lui et les autres arbitrators, d'une planète en perdition, vos états de service se passent de commentaires. »

languages.text: «Por supuesto, tras haberlos salvado a él y a otros Arbitrator de un planeta moribundo, el reconocimiento de su carácter es casi innecesario».
languages.original_text: "Though, having once saved him and the other Arbitrators from a dying planet, your character should require no further affirmation."

traits.locale_text: «Por supuesto, tras haberlos salvado a él y a otros Arbitrator de un planeta moribundo, el reconocimiento de su carácter es casi innecesario».

languages.text: “除此之外，你还将他与其他法务官从某个濒临毁灭的行星上救了出来。我相信，你的品性已无需进一步观察。”
languages.original_text: "Though, having once saved him and the other Arbitrators from a dying planet, your character should require no further affirmation."

traits.locale_text: “除此之外，你还将他与其他法务官从某个濒临毁灭的行星上救了出来。我相信，你的品性已无需进一步观察。”

languages.text: "Nachdem Ihr ihn und die anderen Arbitratoren von einem sterbenden Planeten gerettet habt, sollte Euer Charakter keiner weiteren Prüfung bedürfen."
languages.original_text: "Though, having once saved him and the other Arbitrators from a dying planet, your character should require no further affirmation."

traits.locale_text: "Nachdem Ihr ihn und die anderen Arbitratoren von einem sterbenden Planeten gerettet habt, sollte Euer Charakter keiner weiteren Prüfung bedürfen."

languages.text: 「かつて、彼と他のアービトレイターを死にゆく惑星から救ったことがあるので、あなたの性格はさらなる確認を必要としないはずです」
languages.original_text: "Though, having once saved him and the other Arbitrators from a dying planet, your character should require no further affirmation."

traits.locale_text: 「かつて、彼と他のアービトレイターを死にゆく惑星から救ったことがあるので、あなたの性格はさらなる確認を必要としないはずです」

languages.text: "Gerçi öncesinde de onu ve diğer Yargıcıları ölmekte olan bir gezegenden kurtarmıştınız. Kişiliğinizin daha fazla sınanmasına gerek olmadığı belli."
languages.original_text: "Though, having once saved him and the other Arbitrators from a dying planet, your character should require no further affirmation."

traits.locale_text: "Gerçi öncesinde de onu ve diğer Yargıcıları ölmekte olan bir gezegenden kurtarmıştınız. Kişiliğinizin daha fazla sınanmasına gerek olmadığı belli."
